notes.name_en: *These special rules do not apply to this model's mount (should it have one). A single Dark Elf Master in your army may be upgraded to be your Battle Standard Bearer for +25 points. In addition to their usual allowance of points to spend on magic items, a Battle Standard Bearer can purchase a single magic standard with no points limit.

In addition to their usual allowance of points to spend on magic items, a Battle Standard Bearer can purchase a single magic standard with no points limit.

notes.name_en: Goad Beast: During the Command sub-phase of their turn, this character may goad a single friendly model whose troop type is ‘monster' and that is within their Command range (including their own mount). Until the end of this turn, that model gains a +D3 modifier to its Attacks characteristic (to a maximum of 10).
notes.name_de: Goad Beast: During the Command sub-phase of their turn, this character may goad a single friendly model whose troop type is ‘monster' and that is within their Command range (including their own mount). Until the end of this turn, that model gains a +D3 modifier to its Attacks characteristic (to a maximum of 10).

Until the end of this turn, that model gains a +D3 modifier to its Attacks characteristic (to a maximum of 10).

notes.name_en: Dance Of Death: If this unit makes a successful charge move, the charge target suffers a -1 modifier to its Maximum Rank Bonus until the end of the Combat phase of that turn. A model equipped with a lash & buckler improves its armour value by 1.

notes.name_en: Stony Stare: At the start of each Combat phase, enemy models in base contact with this model must make an Initiative test. If this test is failed, they suffer D3 Strength 2 hits, with no armour save permitted (Ward and Regeneration saves can be attempted as normal). When making a roll To Wound for an attack made with Petrifying gaze, substitute the target's Toughness with its Initiative.
notes.name_de: Stony Stare: At the start of each Combat phase, enemy models in base contact with this model must make an Initiative test. If this test is failed, they suffer D3 Strength 2 hits, with no armour save permitted (Ward and Regeneration saves can be attempted as normal). When making a roll To Wound for an attack made with Petrifying gaze, substitute the target's Toughness with its Initiative.
notes.name_es: Stony Stare: At the start of each Combat phase, enemy models in base contact with this model must make an Initiative test. If this test is failed, they suffer D3 Strength 2 hits, with no armour save permitted (Ward and Regeneration saves can be attempted as normal). When making a roll To Wound for an attack made with Petrifying gaze, substitute the target's Toughness with its Initiative.
notes.name_fr: Stony Stare: At the start of each Combat phase, enemy models in base contact with this model must make an Initiative test. If this test is failed, they suffer D3 Strength 2 hits, with no armour save permitted (Ward and Regeneration saves can be attempted as normal). When making a roll To Wound for an attack made with Petrifying gaze, substitute the target's Toughness with its Initiative.

notes.name_en: Stony Stare: At the start of each Combat phase, enemy models in base contact with this model must make an Initiative test. If this test is failed, they suffer D3 Strength 2 hits, with no armour save permitted (Ward and Regeneration saves can be attempted as normal). When making a roll To Wound for an attack made with Petrifying gaze, substitute the target's Toughness with its Initiative.
notes.name_de: Stony Stare: At the start of each Combat phase, enemy models in base contact with this model must make an Initiative test. If this test is failed, they suffer D3 Strength 2 hits, with no armour save permitted (Ward and Regeneration saves can be attempted as normal). When making a roll To Wound for an attack made with Petrifying gaze, substitute the target's Toughness with its Initiative.

If this test is failed, they suffer D3 Strength 2 hits, with no armour save permitted (Ward and Regeneration saves can be attempted as normal). When making a roll To Wound for an attack made with Petrifying gaze, substitute the target's Toughness with its Initiative.
notes.name_fr: Stony Stare: At the start of each Combat phase, enemy models in base contact with this model must make an Initiative test. If this test is failed, they suffer D3 Strength 2 hits, with no armour save permitted (Ward and Regeneration saves can be attempted as normal). When making a roll To Wound for an attack made with Petrifying gaze, substitute the target's Toughness with its Initiative.

specialRules.name_en: Cursed Coven, Dark Runes, Elven Reflexes, Fast Cavalry, Hatred (High Elves), Open Order, Poisoned Attacks, Swiftstride
specialRules.name_de: Cursed Coven, Dark Runes, Elven Reflexes, Fast Cavalry, Hatred (High Elves), Open Order, Poisoned Attacks, Swiftstride
specialRules.name_es: Cursed Coven, Dark Runes, Elven Reflexes, Fast Cavalry, Hatred (High Elves), Open Order, Poisoned Attacks, Swiftstride
specialRules.name_fr: Cursed Coven, Dark Runes, Elven Reflexes, Fast Cavalry, Hatred (High Elves), Open Order, Poisoned Attacks, Swiftstride

notes.name_en: 0-1 per 1,000. Dark Runes: This unit has a 5+ Ward save against any wounds suffered that were caused by a nonmagical enemy attack. Cursed Coven: A unit of Doomfire Warlocks knows a single spell from either the Dark Magic or Daemonology Lore of Magic. The unit may cast this spell as a Bound spell
notes.name_de: A unit of Doomfire Warlocks knows a single spell (chosen by their controlling player before armies are deployed) from either the Dark Magic or Daemonology Lore of Magic. The unit may cast this spell as a Bound spel
notes.name_es: A unit of Doomfire Warlocks knows a single spell (chosen by their controlling player before armies are deployed) from either the Dark Magic or Daemonology Lore of Magic. The unit may cast this spell as a Bound spel
notes.name_fr: A unit of Doomfire Warlocks knows a single spell (chosen by their controlling player before armies are deployed) from either the Dark Magic or Daemonology Lore of Magic. The unit may cast this spell as a Bound spel
